attributes.action: encourage Michael Martin to reconsider his position as head of the review of MPs expenses due to a clear conflict of interest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has a specific interest in the outcome of the review of MPs expenses and therefore should not be heading the review. He should step down and someone independent should chair the review.

rejection.details: This should be taken up with Parliament directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
